summary: This context block provides the high-level summary and references for the Gold Investment Meta-Framework, including the core theoretical document and supplementary test instructions.

sections.title: Core of the Meta-Framework for Gold Investment Decisions
sections.description: The foundational document outlining a theory-led, technology-enhanced human-machine cognition system for gold investment. It includes the six-stage meta-process, principles for integrating machine learning with economic theory, and guidelines for decision-making under uncertainty.

sections.title: Test Context for Script Validation
sections.description: A test instruction file used to validate the script's ability to infer contextual information and process instructions. Contains example content for testing inference capabilities.
